xml.body:
@r166a@
jehus
thys ys to certify your mastershype that y was disceyvyd & forgetful
of the tyme & place, for y have takyn on tyme for an other yn my boke: for thes
wordes viz ye could never a com yn better season &c wer spoken on palme
sonday evyn at cort when he Mr london cam owt from the councell & not yn hys
own house on palme sonday mornyng & a pon palme sonday mornyng
yn hys own house yn silver streat y delyveryd mi the articles to him
& not at after noon yf a dirig or a marcke be made with a pen then
yt wyl be playn to rede yn my boke
